statements: SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_id = 1
SELECT warehouse_name, shelf_location, product_name FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE shelf_id = 2
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_id = 1 AND shelf_id = 3
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT DISTINCT warehouse_name, shelf_location FROM WarehouseLayout
SELECT warehouse_name, shelf_location, product_name, quantity FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_id = 1 ORDER BY shelf_id ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE shelf_location LIKE '%A%' AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND warehouse_id = 2 ORDER BY shelf_location
SELECT DISTINCT warehouse_id, warehouse_name FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY warehouse_id, shelf_id
SELECT warehouse_name, product_name, quantity FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_id IN (3, 4) ORDER BY warehouse_id, shelf_id ASC
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE aisle_id = 1;
SELECT aisle_name, shelf_count FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY aisle_name DESC;
SELECT aisle_id, aisle_name, shelf_count FROM warehouse_layout WHERE shelf_count > 5;
SELECT aisle_id, aisle_name, shelf_count FROM warehouse_layout WHERE aisle_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT aisle_id, aisle_name, shelf_count FROM warehouse_layout WHERE aisle_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT aisle_name, COUNT(*) AS total_shelves FROM warehouse_layout GROUP BY aisle_name;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM goods_movement WHERE aisle_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT aisle_name, shelf_count FROM warehouse_layout WHERE shelf_count > 10 ORDER BY aisle_name ASC;
SELECT aisle_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM goods_movement INNER JOIN warehouse_layout ON goods_movement.aisle_id = warehouse_layout.aisle_id GROUP BY aisle_name;

SELECT warehouse_layout.aisle_id, aisle_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM warehouse_layout LEFT JOIN goods_movement ON warehouse_layout.aisle_id = goods_movement.aisle_id GROUP BY warehouse_layout.aisle_id ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM goods;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM goods WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, name, category, price FROM goods ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM goods WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT movement_id, product_id, from_location_id, to_location_id FROM movement_history WHERE movement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM warehouse_location;
SELECT name, price FROM goods WHERE category = 'electronics';
SELECT movement_id, movement_date, from_location_id, to_location_id FROM movement_history ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM goods WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_location WHERE shelf_id = 3 AND aisle_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_locations;
SELECT location_id, aisle_number, shelf_number FROM warehouse_locations WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity_in_stock FROM products ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_ordered FROM products p JOIN order_items oi ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE oi.order_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_locations WHERE aisle_number > 5 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY quantity_in_stock ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT item_id, order_id, product_id, quantity_ordered FROM order_items WHERE quantity_ordered > 10 ORDER BY order_id, quantity_ordered DESC;
SELECT location_id, aisle_number, shelf_number, capacity FROM warehouse_locations WHERE capacity < 100 ORDER BY capacity ASC, location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT warehouse_name, location_id, total_capacity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT aisle_id, aisle_number, aisle_length, aisle_width FROM aisle WHERE warehouse_id = 2 ORDER BY aisle_number DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_weight FROM product WHERE product_weight > 100 ORDER BY product_weight ASC;
SELECT movement_id, movement_date FROM movement_history WHERE warehouse_id = 3 AND movement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT warehouse_name, location_id FROM warehouse_layout WHERE total_capacity > 1000;
SELECT aisle_id, aisle_number, aisle_length, aisle_width FROM aisle ORDER BY aisle_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM shelf WHERE shelf_capacity >= 50 ORDER BY shelf_number;
SELECT product_name, product_weight FROM product WHERE product_weight BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
